alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Brevard, southeastern Orange and eastern Osceola Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Canaveral Groves to 8 miles north of Kissimmee Prairie Preserve. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rockledge, Cocoa, Lone Cabbage Fish Camp, Port Saint John and Lake Marian. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
